thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Archway - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Like this place..oh yes
thread.title_full: Like this place..oh yes - Review of Premier Inn London Archway, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lukebighand
title: Like this place..oh yes
text:
So hotels in London are something I have little experience of staying in due to living here.
However in my limited experience this place holds up with the best of them. For a 'no frills' hotel there are quite a lot of frills in the room.
The TV is brand new and of a good spec. There is also a wall panel where you can plug in tablets using a HDMI or USB connection which is great for little uns.
There is a decent selection of coffee and teas. The beds are comfortable and the ac ect. all work well.
Bathroom facilities are clean and there are plenty of towels.
Restaurant and bar are solid with a good range of options on the menu.
Only negative is the high speed internet option takes forever to connect to.
